name: Advanced-QA-and-RAG-Series (Farzad-R)
description: [项目级] This repository contains advanced LLM-based chatbots for Q&A using LLM agents, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and with different databases. (VectorDB, GraphDB, SQLite, CSV, XLSX, etc.)。来源: https://github.com/Farzad-R/Advanced-QA-and-RAG-Series

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
This repository contains advanced LLM-based chatbots for Q&A using LLM agents, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and with different databases. (VectorDB, GraphDB, SQLite, CSV, XLSX, etc.)

来源: https://github.com/Farzad-R/Advanced-QA-and-RAG-Series
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 436
